left_text: Hind basitarsus of female slender, parallel-sided; hind legs of male enlarged, basitarsus forming two enormous curved talons; clypeus separated from antennal bases by much more than diameter of antennal socket (Chile)
right_text: Hind basitarsus of female broadest near base, tapering to narrow apex; hind legs of male not enlarged or modiﬁed; clypeus separated from antennal bases by less than diameter of socket, subantennal suture thus difﬁcult to observe (Africa)
